<doc> MD5 checksum

== Description ==
Compute the MD5 checksum of a string.

== Synopsis ==

=== Server & Client ===

  (md5sum string)


=== Requirements ===

Client code using //MD5// facilities needs to load the script
++md5.js++. Hence, documents using //MD5// must include in their
header, the following statement:

  (<HEAD> :include "md5")


== Server & Client Definitions ==

=== ++(md5sum string)++ ===
<procedure> md5sum
<function> md5sum

<arguments>
^  arguments  ^   type   ^   description                                   ^
| string      |  string  | The string for which the chesum is computed.    |
</arguments>

This procedure returns a string denoting an hexadecimal integer.
</function>
</procedure>

== See also ==

<see-also>md5, base64</see-also>

</doc>
